General.Name: TK Chemical Corporation
General.Description: TK Chemical Corporation operates in the textile industry. The company offers polyester yarns and spandex yarns, as well as PET resins. It also engages in the construction business. The company also exports its products. TK Chemical Corporation was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.
